twoSetSkill.name: Explosive HOMU 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: After picking up 1 HOMU Coins consecutively, generate a BOOM HOMU on the spot that explodes after a delay, dealing 400% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies within a 4-meter radius.

threeSetSkill.name: King HOMU's Treasure 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: After picking up 3 HOMU Coins consecutively, the host heals 10% HP and gains 10% SP.
